name: ICHI
intro: White-label stablecoin solution for DeFi projects
introduce: ICHI is a white-label stablecoin solution for DeFi projects. ICHI enables any crypto project to create a sustainable economy that attracts users and keeps value locked in the community through stable branded dollar — called an ICHI one token — worth exactly $1 and uniquely backed by that project’s native token and A new DeFi-native liquidity program — dubbed an ICHI Angel Vault — that provides protection against price drops.
